title: Integrals of periodic motion for classical equations of relativistic string with masses at ends
abstract: Boundary equations for the relativistic string with masses at ends are formulated in terms of geometrical invariants of world trajectories of masses at the string ends. In the three-dimensional Minkowski space $E^1_2$, there are two invariants of that sort, the curvature $K$ and torsion $\kappa$. For these equations of motion with periodic $\kappa_i(\tau+n l)=\kappa(\tau)$, constants of motion are obtained.
